definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (bridge ? or land of bridges ? cf. Wetzst:Hauran, 82).

of land [[מֶלֶח גְּשׁוּר]] 2Sa 3:3 2Sa 13:37 cf. v:2Sa 13:38 (but text in disorder cf. LXX We Dr) 2Sa 14:32, 2Sa 15:8 [[בַּאֲרָם]] ´[[בִּגְ]] 1Ch 3:2, [[גְּשׁ֫וּרָה]] 2Sa 14:23; a territory E. of the upper Jordan, exact limits unknown; acc. to Guthe:ZPV xii. 1889, 232 f. between Gilead and Hermon, in Jaulân; acc. to Furrer:ib. xiii. 1890, 198 = the Ledjah, district E. of Jaulân, with town Jisre; against him Guthe:ib. 285 f.
